structure.unit: KENTUCKY ALCOHOL AND OTHER DRUG ABUSE PREVENTION, INTERVENTION, AND TREATMENT LAW

law.history: Repealed 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 334, sec. 19, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 39, effective July 1, 1982. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 332, sec. 28. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(1) and (9). -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 166, sec. 3.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Cabinet to study drug problems -- Administrative powers -- Providing treatment -- Fees.
metadata.note: 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 396, sec. 40 would have amended this section effective July 1, 1982. However, 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 396 was repealed by 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 146, also effective July 1, 1982.
